data.title: Rule Not The Exception Podcast — Shibbir Films & Post
data.meta_description: Series editor for the 1st series of 'Rule Not The Exception' Podcast hosted by Sagar Radia and Amrita Acharia
data.text:
RULE NOT THE EXCEPTION PODCAST

I got asked by host Sagar Radia and Amrita Acharia to come on board as the series editor for their new podcast series. The premise of the show was “A collection of experiences and views from friends and peers in the creative arts and beyond” I edited the whole of the 1st and 3rd series and 2 episodes from S2.They’re available via iTunes, Spotify and Simplecast.

Ep1 - James KRISHNA FLOYD

In our very first episode of the podcast we sit down with award winning actor/writer James Krishna Floyd. We explore the highs and lows of his career and why he believes it's important to speak your truth.

EP3 - RUTH MADELEY

The lovely and talented Ruth Madeley joins us on the show as we chart her rise to success from writing student to the BAFTAs!

EP5 - JIMMY AKINBOLA

We sit down with British acting legend, Jimmy Akingbola as he talks us through starting Triforce Creative Network, working with Idris Elba and how the industry has evolved over the years.

EP6 - PRIYANGA BURFORD

Priyanga Burford stops by for a chat with us at Rule Not The Exception. Her knowledge and experience of the entertainment industry is something not to be missed!

EP7 - ELLIOT BARNES-WORRELL

Actor/Director Elliot Barnes-Worrell talks about the mixed race experience in TV, attending BRIT school, his time at drama school, holding a ‘tray’ at the Royal Shakespeare Company, doing Man And Superman with Ralph Fiennes and possibly the time he met Steven Spielberg

EP8 - sacha dhawan

We chart the rise of one of Britain's best loved actors, Sacha Dhawan. From child actor to The History Boys, The Boy with The Topknot to The Master in Doctor Who, Sacha sits down with us at Rule Not The Exception.

EP9 - eleanor matsuura

One of the stars of AMC's The Walking Dead, Eleanor Matsuura joins us on the podcast discussing her early years as an actor, motherhood and how she may see her future behind the camera as well!

EP10 - NIKESH SHUKLA

In our series one finale, we speak with writer Nikesh Shukla about his early rapping aspirations, how he made the transition into writing, and seeing representation the right way.

S2 EP1 - YASEN ATOUR

In the opening episode of series 2 we sit down with actor/filmmaker, Yasen Atour on his journey as an actor, teacher and mentor.

S2 EP5 - david jonsson

One of the star's of HBO/BBC's new drama Industry, David Jonsson talks to us about his short but fruitful journey so far, including his beginnings in East London, and his love for the stage.

S3 EP1 - PRASANNA PUWANARAJAH

An acclaimed actor, writer and director, Prasanna gives us an insight into his views of the biz and how he went from doctor to director!

S3 EP2 - AMBREEN RAZIA

Ambreen sits down to discuss her writing process, her drive for excellence and how she's making her mark both on the page and on camera!

S3 EP4 - NITIN SAWHNEY

Here Nitin discusses, his early influences, growing up dealing racism in his youth, to his time acting in the Goodness Gracious Me troupe as well as the influence & reach of S. Asian artists in the industry.

S3 EP5 - SANTOSH SHAH

From the streets of Nepal to winning the nation's hearts on Masterchef, chef Santosh Shah talks about his humble beginnings, working in India and how he managed to compete on the UK's most prestigious cookery competition, Masterchef
